snippet.title: Why Do You Love Me? - Visual Novel Announcement Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
Why do you love me? - a short romantic novel about modern relationships. We took some situations from life and tried to answer the question "why do people love each other?".
12.02.2024

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2802790/Why_do_you_love_me/

Creative Director/Storyboard:
Alkinoy

Art Director/Visual:
Vioser

Sound on video:
TK Projects - Always On My Mind (Degica Co., LTD)
